Thanks for your help!

Describe your issue: I am new and looking around.
I notice you have a website option, but there is zero information about what is included, so I am trying to find out before proceeding.
for example, how do you compare to <NAME>?
do you host the website too? how much per month, or year, do you charge?
do you have apps, such as chat, payment facilities, etc, that can be included, the same as in a <NAME> setup?
Can you point me to full information about your website building area please. A little confused if i should build a website with you or with <NAME>. Just no information on your site about your website building facilities.
Thanks for your help.
